content: The thing that was really interesting in the trailer that wasn’t discussed here is the whole light/dark and balance aspect Rey is speaking about. We all know about the Force and the “Dark Side”, but speaking to balance it sounds like there is an acknowledgment that both sides are required/essential, as opposed to the usual narrative that the dark side needs to be destroyed and eliminated. Could also connect to Luke’s comment about the Jedi needing to end. Should be interesting!
